title: Executive Order 5114-Designating Horace Paul Bestor as Commissioner of the Federal Farm Loan Board
content: Under the provisions of Section 3 of the Federal Farm Loan Act, approved July 17, 1916, Horace Paul Bestor, who has been duly appointed a member of the Federal Farm Loan Board, is hereby designated Farm Loan Commissioner of said Board until otherwise directed.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5114-Designating Horace Paul Bestor as Commissioner of the Federal Farm Loan Board Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/372832
